attributes.action: Strongly consider asking the Rt Hon Tony Blair to consider standing for Parliament with immediate effect, with the view of regaining the office of Prime Minister with immediate effect.  If nothing else, this would liven up PMQs, which have undoubtedly suffered since the current dear leader's ascension to the throne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
